Package Attributes

Class ChainAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractObjects.ItemWithId
      • Attributes.Attribute
        • Attributes.ChainAttribute

  • public class ChainAttribute
extends Attribute
    This class represents chains of attributes. Example: concept: Smith, attributes: friends parents age
    represents the ages of the parents of Smith's friends.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        creates a new attribute chain
        Parameters:
        name - the applicationName of the chain.
        context - where the objects live in.
        attributeChain - the list of attributes in the attribute chain.

      • getAttributeChain

        public java.util.ArrayList<Attribute> getAttributeChain​()
        returns the attribute chain. All but the last attribute must not be DataAttributes.
        Returns:
        the actual attribute chain

      • getFirst

        public DataObject getFirst​(Concept concept,
                           Scope scope,
                           Operators operator,
                           DataObject otherValue,
                           java.lang.Object otherConstraints,
                           Context context)
        gets the first value of the attribute chain for a given concept. If all attributes are functional this is just the first value. If some attributes have mor than one value, the first attribute in a depth-first search is returned.
        Overrides:
        getFirst in class Attribute
        Parameters:
        concept - the concept in the domain of the attribute chain.
        scope - the scope for the value to be returned.
        operator - for comparing the returned value with otherValue
        otherValue - the value for comparing 'value operator otherValue'
        otherConstraints - constraints for the selecting the attribute values, one for each level in the attribute chain.
        context - where the objects live in.
        Returns:
        the first non-null value in the chain.

      • stream

        public java.util.stream.Stream<DataObject> stream​(Concept concept,
                                                  Scope scope,
                                                  Operators operator,
                                                  DataObject otherValue,
                                                  java.lang.Object otherConstraints,
                                                  Context context)
        gets a stream of values of the last attribute in the attribute chain.
        Specified by:
        stream in class Attribute
        Parameters:
        concept - the concept in the domain of the attribute chain.
        scope - the scope for the value to be returned.
        operator - for comparing the returned value with otherValue
        otherValue - the value for comparing 'value operator otherValue'
        otherConstraints - constraints for the selecting the attribute values, one for each level in the attribute chain.
        context - where the objects live in.
        Returns:
        the stream of values of the last attribute in the attribute chain.

      • parseString

        public static ChainAttribute parseString​(java.lang.String type,
                                         java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String declaration,
                                         java.lang.String namespace,
                                         Context context,
                                         java.lang.StringBuilder errors,
                                         int lineNumber,
                                         DataBlock dataBlock)
        parses a chainAttribute declaration: "ChainAttribute [applicationName] attribute1,...
        Parameters:
        type - must be "ChainAttribute"
        name - the attribute's applicationName
        declaration - the attribute declaration
        context - the context where the objects live in.
        namespace - prefix for the attribute names
        errors - for appending error messages
        dataBlock - the origin of the data.
        Returns:
        the new AttributeChain or null
